bibl.title: The Dream of Nektanebos.
bibl.note: P. Leid. I, pap. U = U.P.Z. I, 81 (= Pack2 2476). - Edition and notes. - The composition in rhythmical prose. - The story and its interpretation in the context of Egyptian literature (similarity to the Königsnovellen).
bibl.seg: Koenen Ludwig, The Dream of Nektanebos.

P. Leid. I, pap. U = U.P.Z. I, 81 (= Pack2 2476). - Edition and notes. - The composition in rhythmical prose. - The story and its interpretation in the context of Egyptian literature (similarity to the Königsnovellen).
